subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we are accepting your refinance loan request
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this deal will expire TODAY):
$331,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://swimaunland.com/
